products.name: A zombie chocolate bunny
products.details: The only thing better than a chocolate Easter bunny is a chocolate Easter bunny with an insatiable thirst for blood.

products.name: A Godzilla garden gnome
products.details: Let those pesky, roving neighborhood gnomes know where they're not welcome.

products.name: Nothing
products.details: What do you get for the person who has everything? Nothingâ€”literally. But unlike traditional nothing, this one will cost you almost $7.

products.name: Gardening claws
products.details: Now you can garden like the wild beast you are. Just be sure not to fall into any wild animal traps you may have set back when you were a poor, claw-less human.

products.name: An air-blaster
products.details: They say this loud and terrifying thing is for fun with family and friends, but it seems better suited to enemies and nemeses.
